entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
